p: For further evaluation of the α-glucosidase inhibitory activity, we conducted further investigation on major components isolated from M. fragrans. Among the isolated compounds, we found that malabaricone C possesses stronger inhibitory activity against α-glucosidase. Figure 3 shows the dose-response curves of malabaricone C on α-glucosidase inhibition with the IC 50 value of 20.97 ± 0.17 μg/mL.
